mobile.name: dervish raggity
mobile.long_description: A raggity dervish walks on aimlessly.
mobile.description: Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use some rest.

mobile.name: dervish large
mobile.long_description: A large dervish watches for signs of trouble.
mobile.description: Dressed in loose fitting rags, this man looks like he could use LOTS of rest.

mobile.name: snake coral
mobile.long_description: A brightly colored snake slithers along the sands.
mobile.description: This relatively harmless snake has bright alternating bands of red, yellow and black.

mobile.name: scorpion small
mobile.long_description: A small, red scorpion scuttles away at your approach.
mobile.description: The little tail is mighty dangerous for such a small creature.

mobile.name: worm giant purple
mobile.long_description: A giant, purple sand worm thrusts up out of the sand and attacks!
mobile.description: He's big, mean, and purple. Watch out!

mobile.name: dragon brass
mobile.long_description: A very large brass dragon steps out of the darkness and says 'Hello.'
mobile.description: Then adds to it, 'Prepare to die, have a nice day!'

mobile.name: nomad leader
mobile.long_description: The nomad leader sits silently in prayer.
mobile.description: He is clad in silk robes lined with gold thread. At his side is a large, engraved cutlass. He has an especially haughty air about him.

mobile.name: nomad commander
mobile.long_description: The nomad commander stands here staring at you suspiciously.
mobile.description: This is the nomad leader's second in command. His clothes are richly woven of silk and gold thread. A nasty cutlass hangs at his side.

mobile.name: nomad warrior
mobile.long_description: A proud nomad warrior stands here.
mobile.description: This warrior is dressed in typical nomad clothing and looks quite mean.

mobile.name: slave young
mobile.long_description: A young slave sits here staring at you with pleading eyes.
mobile.description: She looks quite thin and weak.

mobile.name: dracolich lich
mobile.long_description: A pile of bones rises up to form a skeletal dracolich.
mobile.description: The dracolich is now only bone with pieces of flesh hanging from it. Obviously it no longer fears death.

mobile.name: drider
mobile.long_description: The drider looks at you viciously while it draws its sword.
mobile.description: This half-spider, half-drow creature is a formidable opponent.

mobile.name: duergar dark dwarf
mobile.long_description: A duergar is here mining precious stones with his pick.
mobile.description: The duergar could probably crush your head as easily as he does those rocks.

mobile.name: myconoid
mobile.description: The myconoid looks something like a giant mushroom (and probably has the same effect).

mobile.name: myconoid shaman
mobile.long_description: A rather large myconoid stands here chanting in a strange tongue.
mobile.description: The shaman shoots spores into the air.

mobile.name: dustdigger oasis
mobile.long_description: A small oasis invites you to dive in.
mobile.description: Looking a little closer at this oasis, you begin to wonder why it seems to be moving about...

mobile.name: camel
mobile.long_description: A very dangerous creature, a camel, snorts at you.
mobile.description: It is advisable not to mess with this creature. After all, you have heard many a horror story about experiences with camels. Bad experiences.
